attributes.action: Make carrying a knife without good cause to carry highest penalities and will include under 16 year olds as well
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Appalled at how knife crime has become an every day part of life. Currently 18 young people have died due to knife crime. How many more have to die before anything is done! or even injured. Action needs to be taken now and make carrying a knife without good reason carry much higher penalties. If people want to carry a knife then they have to take the consequences of their actions.

Time for change is now, if that includes use of metal detectors in public places, continually doing random checks to safe guard the Community.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
